Vendored third-party sources
============================

This project vendors external repositories directly into `third_party/`.
The original repository URLs and commit SHAs are recorded below for
reproducibility.

Sources
-------

- YOLOv7
  - URL: https://github.com/WongKinYiu/yolov7
  - Commit: a207844b1ce82d204ab36d87d496728d3d2348e7
- YOLOv8 (Ultralytics)
  - URL: https://github.com/ultralytics/ultralytics
  - Commit: 79e318cb43841931e244f829af56b25aa18a6d22
- LieConv
  - URL: https://github.com/mfinzi/LieConv
  - Commit: 93affb1806100a848fdf7065d52bc69aff91405e
